name: Coal Skin Burnback
description: The burnback effect from the burning coals skin.
Your Fire Elemental abilities grant you good resistance to temperature conditions and heat damage.  Also your body emits streams of heat into anyone who attack you,.

hit_me_effect.message: Flames and heat flash out from where you've been hit.
hit_me_effect.npc_message: %1$s's body jets fire and heat out from the wound.
